abilities.name: Gut 'Em
abilities.description: Attacks have a chance to have True Strike and deal a percentage of the target's current health as bonus physical damage.
notes: Can proc against buildings but does not apply the attack damage bonus against them
Effects are calculated upon reaching the attack point, not upon landing an attack
For ranged heroes, this is upon projectile launch
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the current health as attack damage bonus and the attack damage bonus against Roshan are increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
Deals a flat attack damage bonus against Roshan
Enhancement available when crafted with Dormant Curio
